document.full_text: twenty-seven pakistani police and paramilitary soldiers and up to 40 insurgents were killed in clashes after heavily armed militants crossed over from afghanistan and attacked a checkpoint, officials said on thursday.
document.title: nearly 30 pakistani police, 40 militants killed in raid
lines_and_colors: twenty-seven pakistani police and paramilitary soldiers and up to 40 insurgents were killed in clashes after heavily armed militants crossed over from afghanistan and attacked a checkpoint, officials said on thursday.
